title: Foreign Exchange Rates from Central Bank of Sri Lanka; USD, GBP, EUR, SGD, CAD
dc:creator: Editor
description:
The Sri Lanka Rupee remains steady after fluctuating over the last few days.

The post Foreign Exchange Rates from Central Bank of Sri Lanka; USD, GBP, EUR, SGD, CAD appeared first on NewsIn.Asia.
content:encoded:
Colombo, Nov 4 (newsin.asia) – The selling rate of the US Dollar has been declared as Rs. 371.68 today by the Central Bank of Sri Lanka. 

The rupee has fluctuated against a few other foreign currencies in comparison to yesterday (03).
